I have forgiven Michael Vick . From this day forward, I will no longer bash Michael Vick on my Facebook page or in this column. There will be no more references to "scum" or a piece of trash who shouldn't be given the privilege of playing quarterback in the NFL. Seriously, I am trying to learn the true meaning of the word "forgiveness" and sometimes that means letting things go. This does not mean I condone his felonious acts of animal cruelty

choices, clothing style, etc. "The reason we replaced` Idol' with` The X Factor' in the U.K. to begin with is that I got bored just judging," Simon Cowell said. It's an interesting thing to be judged as well as the competitor because when you lose an artist, you know part of you has lost as well. It really does become incredibly competitive between the judges... in a way they're more competitive than the artists because we don't pretend to like each other. Speaking of the judges, Simon Cowell isn't ready to announce who will be joining him on the panel. But he expects to make his final decision in the next three or four weeks. Right now
